name: @ffi-packager/libclang
description: Node.js module for libclang, used for parsing C language family (C, C++, Objective C/C++, OpenCL, CUDA, and RenderScript) files from javascript.
author: Timothy J Fontaine <tjfontaine@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: npm run --silent lint:xo && npm run --silent lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: npm run --silent lint:xo:fix && npm run --silent lint:prettier:fix
scripts.lint:prettier: prettier --list-different "**/*.json" "**/*.md" || { echo "Prettier needs to format the above files. Try 'npm run --silent lint:fix'." && exit 1; }
scripts.prepublishOnly: git diff-index --exit-code master && npm run --silent rebuild && npm run --silent test
